verses.text_plain: Behold, the Lord’s hand is not shortened, that it cannot save; neither his ear heavy, that it cannot hear:
verses.verse_html: 1Behold, the Lord’s hand is not shortened, that it cannot save; neither his ear heavy, that it cannot hear:

verses.text_plain: But your iniquities have separated between you and your God, and your sins have hid his face from you, that he will not hear.
verses.verse_html:
2But your iniquities have separated between you and your God, and your sins have hid his face from you, that he will not hear. ▼
▼ have hid: or, have made him hide

tokens.text: from you, that he will not hear

footnotes.body_text: ▼ have hid: or, have made him hide
footnotes.body_html: ▼ have hid: or, have made him hide

verses.text_plain: For your hands are defiled with blood, and your fingers with iniquity; your lips have spoken lies, your tongue hath muttered perverseness.
verses.verse_html: 3For your hands are defiled with blood, and your fingers with iniquity; your lips have spoken lies, your tongue hath muttered perverseness.

verses.text_plain: None calleth for justice, nor any pleadeth for truth: they trust in vanity, and speak lies; they conceive mischief, and bring forth iniquity.
verses.verse_html: 4None calleth for justice, nor any pleadeth for truth: they trust in vanity, and speak lies; they conceive mischief, and bring forth iniquity.

verses.text_plain: They hatch cockatrice’ eggs, and weave the spider’s web: he that eateth of their eggs dieth, and that which is crushed breaketh out into a viper.
verses.verse_html:
5They hatch cockatrice’ eggs, and weave the spider’s web: he that eateth of their eggs dieth, and that which is crushed breaketh out into a viper. ▼
▼ cockatrice’: or, adder’s
 , ▼
▼ crushed…: or, sprinkled is as if there brake out a viper

footnotes.body_text: ▼ crushed…: or, sprinkled is as if there brake out a viper
footnotes.body_html: ▼ crushed…: or, sprinkled is as if there brake out a viper

verses.text_plain: Their webs shall not become garments, neither shall they cover themselves with their works: their works are works of iniquity, and the act of violence is in their hands.
verses.verse_html: 6Their webs shall not become garments, neither shall they cover themselves with their works: their works are works of iniquity, and the act of violence is in their hands.

verses.text_plain: Their feet run to evil, and they make haste to shed innocent blood: their thoughts are thoughts of iniquity; wasting and destruction are in their paths.
verses.verse_html:
7Their feet run to evil, and they make haste to shed innocent blood: their thoughts are thoughts of iniquity; wasting and destruction are in their paths. ▼
▼ destruction: Heb. breaking

verses.text_plain: The way of peace they know not; and there is no judgment in their goings: they have made them crooked paths: whosoever goeth therein shall not know peace.
verses.verse_html:
8The way of peace they know not; and there is no judgment in their goings: they have made them crooked paths: whosoever goeth therein shall not know peace. ▼
▼ judgment: or, right

verses.text_plain: Therefore is judgment far from us, neither doth justice overtake us: we wait for light, but behold obscurity; for brightness, but we walk in darkness.
verses.verse_html: 9Therefore is judgment far from us, neither doth justice overtake us: we wait for light, but behold obscurity; for brightness, but we walk in darkness.

verses.text_plain: We grope for the wall like the blind, and we grope as if we had no eyes: we stumble at noonday as in the night; we are in desolate places as dead men.
verses.verse_html: 10We grope for the wall like the blind, and we grope as if we had no eyes: we stumble at noonday as in the night; we are in desolate places as dead men.

verses.text_plain: We roar all like bears, and mourn sore like doves: we look for judgment, but there is none; for salvation, but it is far off from us.
verses.verse_html: 11We roar all like bears, and mourn sore like doves: we look for judgment, but there is none; for salvation, but it is far off from us.

verses.text_plain: For our transgressions are multiplied before thee, and our sins testify against us: for our transgressions are with us; and as for our iniquities, we know them;
verses.verse_html: 12For our transgressions are multiplied before thee, and our sins testify against us: for our transgressions are with us; and as for our iniquities, we know them;

verses.text_plain: In transgressing and lying against the Lord, and departing away from our God, speaking oppression and revolt, conceiving and uttering from the heart words of falsehood.
verses.verse_html: 13In transgressing and lying against the Lord, and departing away from our God, speaking oppression and revolt, conceiving and uttering from the heart words of falsehood.

verses.text_plain: And judgment is turned away backward, and justice standeth afar off: for truth is fallen in the street, and equity cannot enter.
verses.verse_html: 14And judgment is turned away backward, and justice standeth afar off: for truth is fallen in the street, and equity cannot enter.

verses.text_plain: Yea, truth faileth; and he that departeth from evil maketh himself a prey: and the Lord saw it, and it displeased him that there was no judgment.
verses.verse_html:
15Yea, truth faileth; and he that departeth from evil maketh himself a prey: and the Lord saw it, and it displeased him that there was no judgment. ▼
▼ maketh…: or, is accounted mad
 , ▼
▼ it displeased…: Heb. it was evil in his eyes

footnotes.body_html: ▼ maketh…: or, is accounted mad

footnotes.body_text: ▼ it displeased…: Heb. it was evil in his eyes
footnotes.body_html: ▼ it displeased…: Heb. it was evil in his eyes

verses.text_plain: And he saw that there was no man, and wondered that there was no intercessor: therefore his arm brought salvation unto him; and his righteousness, it sustained him.
verses.verse_html: 16And he saw that there was no man, and wondered that there was no intercessor: therefore his arm brought salvation unto him; and his righteousness, it sustained him.

verses.text_plain: For he put on righteousness as a breastplate, and an helmet of salvation upon his head; and he put on the garments of vengeance for clothing, and was clad with zeal as a cloke.
verses.verse_html: 17For he put on righteousness as a breastplate, and an helmet of salvation upon his head; and he put on the garments of vengeance for clothing, and was clad with zeal as a cloke.

verses.text_plain: According to their deeds, accordingly he will repay, fury to his adversaries, recompence to his enemies; to the islands he will repay recompence.
verses.verse_html:
18According to their deeds, accordingly he will repay, fury to his adversaries, recompence to his enemies; to the islands he will repay recompence. ▼
▼ deeds: Heb. recompences

verses.text_plain: So shall they fear the name of the Lord from the west, and his glory from the rising of the sun. When the enemy shall come in like a flood, the Spirit of the Lord shall lift up a standard against him.
verses.verse_html:
19So shall they fear the name of the Lord from the west, and his glory from the rising of the sun. When the enemy shall come in like a flood, the Spirit of the Lord shall lift up a standard against him. ▼
▼ lift…: or, put him to flight

footnotes.body_text: ▼ lift…: or, put him to flight
footnotes.body_html: ▼ lift…: or, put him to flight

verses.text_plain: And the Redeemer shall come to Zion, and unto them that turn from transgression in Jacob, saith the Lord.
verses.verse_html: 20And the Redeemer shall come to Zion, and unto them that turn from transgression in Jacob, saith the Lord.

verses.text_plain: As for me, this is my covenant with them, saith the Lord; My spirit that is upon thee, and my words which I have put in thy mouth, shall not depart out of thy mouth, nor out of the mouth of thy seed, nor out of the mouth of thy seed’s seed, saith the Lord, from henceforth and for ever.
verses.verse_html: 21As for me, this is my covenant with them, saith the Lord; My spirit that is upon thee, and my words which I have put in thy mouth, shall not depart out of thy mouth, nor out of the mouth of thy seed, nor out of the mouth of thy seed’s seed, saith the Lord, from henceforth and for ever.
